definition[0]: to spoil something by making a stupid mistake or doing it badly
example[0]: His secretary cocked up his travelling schedule and he’s furious about it.
definition[1]: something that has been spoiled by someone’s stupid mistake or by being done badly
example[1]: He’s made a monumental cock-up of his first assignment.
example[2]: There’s been a cock-up over the tickets for the football on Saturday.
